channel.title: Delta Hp bar bug, Dying with full green bar, hits just showing 0's sometimes?
channel.description:
[b]Okay several problems I have encountered with the deltascape base and if they could be fixed I think alot of people including myself would benefite greatlly, I had not come across these bugs until finding deltascape.[/b] [i] - Delta Hp Bar showing Full green dead - Damaging hits showing 0's sometimes .[/i]
Anyone got any idea's?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 02:34:56 pm[/size][hr]I know that when you are killed your hp goes back up to 99 before being teled, maybe if u moved the hp refill to when you are teled the that wud do something? not sure

item.title: Delta Hp bar bug, Dying with full green bar, hits just showing 0's sometimes?
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

Okay several problems I have encountered with the deltascape base and if they could be fixed I think alot of people including myself would benefite greatlly, I had not come across these bugs until finding deltascape.
[i]

  • Delta Hp Bar showing Full green dead
  • Damaging hits showing 0’s sometimes .[/i]

Anyone got any idea’s?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 02:34:56 pm[/size][hr]I know that when you are killed your hp goes back up to 99 before being teled, maybe if u moved the hp refill to when you are teled the that wud do something? not sure
